cards.title: packages/ui: enforce shadcn-first contribution guardrails
cards.description:
Problem/Context:
Without explicit guardrails, future component work may reintroduce custom rewrites instead of reusing shadcn primitives.

Scope Boundaries:
- In scope: add `packages/ui` contribution guidance and checklist that mandates shadcn-first component additions.
- In scope: add lightweight automated checks (lint/script/test) to catch direct duplication/rewrite patterns for existing shadcn primitives.
- Out of scope: external design system tooling (Storybook rollout, visual diff platform setup).

Acceptance Criteria:
1. Repo docs include a clear `packages/ui` rule: use shadcn primitives/components; do not hand-rewrite equivalents.
2. A CI-checkable command exists and fails when forbidden duplication patterns are introduced.
3. Guardrails are referenced in developer workflow docs for UI changes.
4. All new checks pass on current codebase.

Success Metrics:
- 1 documented policy section for shadcn-first UI contribution.
- 1 automated check integrated into package or repo scripts.

Test Plan:
- Unit: verify guard script rules with pass/fail fixtures where practical.
- Integration: run guard command in CI/local workflow.
- E2E: N/A.

Out-of-Scope:
- Complete visual regression infrastructure.

cards.title: packages/ui: add consumer smoke harness for shadcn exports
cards.description:
Problem/Context:
`@mmo-claw/ui` needs a repeatable consumer-level check to ensure exported shadcn components work in downstream apps and discourage local rewrites.

Scope Boundaries:
- In scope: add package-level integration smoke harness that imports exported primitives from `@mmo-claw/ui` in a consumer fixture.
- In scope: validate core shadcn exports render and type-check without internal-path imports.
- Out of scope: feature-specific UI rewrites in `apps/desktop`.

Acceptance Criteria:
1. A consumer smoke test/fixture exists and imports `@mmo-claw/ui` public exports only.
2. Smoke harness covers baseline primitives and newly added shadcn primitives.
3. Build/test fail if consumers must import component internals to compile.
4. Harness runs in CI/local scripts for repeatable validation.

Success Metrics:
- 1 automated consumer smoke command for `@mmo-claw/ui` in scripts.
- 0 internal-path imports required by the fixture for covered primitives.

Test Plan:
- Unit: N/A for harness structure.
- Integration: run consumer fixture build/test against package exports.
- E2E: N/A.

Out-of-Scope:
- Migrating app feature code to new primitives in this story.

cards.title: packages/ui: add shadcn overlay/navigation primitives for desktop shell
cards.description:
Problem/Context:
Desktop shell features (drawer chat, dialogs, menus, tabs) currently rely on local UI composition. We need shared primitives to avoid rework and inconsistencies.

Scope Boundaries:
- In scope: add shadcn-based `Sheet`, `Dialog`, `DropdownMenu`, `Tabs`, `ScrollArea`, `Separator` primitives to `packages/ui`.
- In scope: export all new primitives from `packages/ui/src/index.ts`.
- Out of scope: redesigning feature UX or animation behavior beyond shadcn defaults.

Acceptance Criteria:
1. All listed primitives are implemented with shadcn composition and expected sub-component APIs.
2. No bespoke rewrite of already-available shadcn primitives.
3. Components are consumable by `apps/desktop` without importing internals.
4. `@mmo-claw/ui` build/lint/test pass.

Success Metrics:
- At least 6 overlay/navigation primitives exported and documented in source comments/readme.
- Consumer app imports for these primitives resolve without path hacks.

Test Plan:
- Unit: open/close and keyboard interaction tests where applicable.
- Integration: render a shell mock with sheet+tabs+menu composition.
- E2E: optional desktop smoke for one overlay component.

Out-of-Scope:
- Complex custom animation frameworks.

cards.title: packages/ui: add shadcn form primitives (input/select/textarea/etc.)
cards.description:
Problem/Context:
Desktop flows (chat, settings, profile forms) need a shared form primitive set. Today these controls are ad-hoc or local to app code.

Scope Boundaries:
- In scope: add shadcn form primitives to `packages/ui/src/components` and export them from `packages/ui/src/index.ts`.
- In scope: primitives include `Input`, `Label`, `Textarea`, `Select`, `Checkbox`, `Switch` (and related sub-components required by shadcn patterns).
- Out of scope: business-form schemas and validation rules per feature.

Acceptance Criteria:
1. All listed form primitives are added via shadcn patterns; no manual re-implementation of those primitives.
2. Each primitive is exported from `@mmo-claw/ui` public API.
3. Style tokens/class usage stays consistent with the shadcn baseline from the previous story.
4. Package build/lint/test pass for `packages/ui`.

Success Metrics:
- At least 6 new shadcn form primitives exported from `@mmo-claw/ui`.
- 0 duplicate local form primitive implementations in `apps/desktop` for covered controls.

Test Plan:
- Unit: render + interaction tests for each primitive family.
- Integration: one sample composed form rendered from consumer side.
- E2E: optional smoke through desktop settings form if wired.

Out-of-Scope:
- Feature-specific API validation and backend submission.

cards.title: packages/ui: shadcn baseline + replace custom button/card
cards.description:
Problem/Context:
`packages/ui` currently ships hand-written primitives (`button`, `card`, `page-shell`) that diverge from shadcn patterns. This causes inconsistent API/styling and extra maintenance.

Scope Boundaries:
- In scope: shadcn-first setup inside `packages/ui`, replace existing `button` and `card` implementations with shadcn-based component files, preserve package export ergonomics.
- In scope: update required shadcn/radix dependencies in `packages/ui/package.json`.
- Out of scope: broad desktop screen migration (handled in follow-up story).

Acceptance Criteria:
1. `packages/ui` has shadcn-compatible component structure and dependencies needed for generated primitives.
2. `packages/ui/src/components/button.tsx` and `packages/ui/src/components/card.tsx` follow shadcn composition patterns (forwardRef/cva pattern where applicable), not bespoke rewrites.
3. Existing exports in `packages/ui/src/index.ts` keep working for consumers.
4. `pnpm --filter @mmo-claw/ui build` and lint pass.

Success Metrics:
- 100% of exported base primitives (`Button`, `Card`) in `@mmo-claw/ui` are shadcn-based.
- 0 custom variant systems remain for these primitives.

Test Plan:
- Unit: component render and variant/class snapshots for button/card.
- Integration: import and render from a consumer app entry.
- E2E: N/A for package-only story.

Out-of-Scope:
- New primitive families beyond button/card.

cards.title: Settings: Telegram Token + Secret Storage
cards.description: Add settings workflows and IPC for Telegram token and API key management using keytar/PocketPaw vault patterns, with validation and masked value handling.

cards.title: PocketPaw Daemon Auto-Start + Tray Lifecycle Hardening
cards.description: Ensure desktop startup path auto-launches PocketPaw daemon, performs health checks/retry policy, and aligns tray behavior with daemon state for first-launch and normal boot.

cards.title: Run Status Feed from PocketPaw to Desktop
cards.description: Forward PocketPaw actor lifecycle events to Electron (queued/running/success/fail) via WebSocket bridge with correlation IDs for chat, dashboard, and runs views.

cards.title: Unified Command Router (Telegram + Drawer)
cards.description: Implement one command-routing service so Telegram gateway and in-app drawer chat execute the same PocketPaw skill/actor pathways with normalized payloads and consistent errors.

cards.title: Renderer Chat Store + Streaming Transcript
cards.description: Build Zustand chat store and renderer bindings for live streamed assistant responses, optimistic user messages, retry/cancel states, and per-session transcript retention.

cards.title: Electron Main PocketPaw WS Bridge
cards.description: Implement main-process PocketPaw client bridge over WebSocket/HTTP with reconnect, heartbeat, and typed event forwarding to renderer for chat and run updates.

cards.title: IPC Contracts for PocketPaw Chat Streaming
cards.description: Define typed IPC request/response/event contracts for in-app chat: send message, stream token/event chunks, cancel stream, and report errors with stable codes.

cards.title: Desktop Right Drawer Chat UI
cards.description: Implement a right-side drawer chat panel in Electron renderer that is accessible across app pages, supports message compose/send, quick command chips, and responsive collapse behavior.

cards.title: Scaffold packages/ipc
cards.description: Shared IPC type contracts setup.

cards.title: Turborepo Init & Structure
cards.description: Initialize Turborepo and folder structure (apps, packages).

cards.title: Scaffold apps/desktop
cards.description: Electron + Vite + React + shadcn + Zustand setup.

cards.title: Scaffold packages/db
cards.description: Shared SQLite schema + queries (better-sqlite3).

cards.title: Fork apps/pocketpaw
cards.description: Fork and run PocketPaw locally.

cards.title: Scaffold packages/ui
cards.description: Shared shadcn component library setup.

cards.title: Integrate PocketPaw in Electron
cards.description: Basic Electron window loads PocketPaw at :8888.

cards.title: Bundle uv binary
cards.description: Download and bundle uv binary for all platforms in resources/bin.

cards.title: Implement uvx-manager
cards.description: Create packages/uvx-manager to handle Python runtime.

cards.title: Install PocketPaw via Manager
cards.description: Install PocketPaw fork via uvx-manager.

cards.title: Install Camoufox
cards.description: Install Camoufox via uvx-manager.

cards.title: Marketplace UI Skeleton
cards.description: Create Marketplace UI skeleton.

cards.title: Scaffold packages/browser
cards.description: BrowserProvider abstraction.

cards.title: Wire Camoufox Provider
cards.description: Connect Camoufox provider.

cards.title: Create Instagram Poster Actor
cards.description: packages/actors/instagram-poster Crawlee actor.

cards.title: PocketPaw Skill Wrapper
cards.description: Wrap actor as PocketPaw skill.

cards.title: Implement Full Flow
cards.description: Telegram -> PocketPaw -> skill -> actor -> Camoufox -> post.

cards.description: Validate scrum workflow

epics.name: Phase 0 - Monorepo Setup
epics.description: Monorepo Setup (Turborepo, apps/desktop, apps/pocketpaw, packages/ipc, packages/db, packages/ui)

epics.name: Phase 3 - Shared UI (shadcn-first)
epics.description: Expand packages/ui as a shared component layer by composing shadcn primitives and patterns. No handcrafted rewrites of components that already exist in shadcn.
